title: Swedish Massage
subTitle: Ginny Redpath's technical expertise includes Swedish Massage, reflexology, energy work, injury treatment, hydrotherapy & much more.
content: The process may include Swedish movements such as effleurage, petrissage, tapotement, compression, vibration, friction, and nerve strokes. These techniques can be done by hand or with a mechanical or electrical apparatus.  Oils, hot and cold packs, and hot rock offer additional relief.

title: Compassionate Care
content: is owned and operated by Licensed Massage Therapist Ginny Redpath. Here at Compassionate Care we primarily work with the senior community and those without the resources to pay out of pocket for massage treatment. We like to collaborate with clients that are interested in self-care focusing on a combination of body, mind, and spirit. We believe strongly in client confidentialy and hope to help you promote safety and healing in your pursuit of health care options.
imageAlt: A lotus flower in the sun, a sign of Compassion, Courage, Mindfulness, Peace, & Wisdom

title: Ginny Redpath
content: is a graduate of Mueller College of Holistic Studies in San Diego and Brian Utting School of Massage in Seattle. With over 25 years of experience as a Licensed Massage Therapist, Ginny has worked at spas, salons, privates practices, retirement homes, and chiropractic clinics. Ginnyâ€™s goal is to offer techniques that best serve the needs of the individual supporting a lifetime of health maintenance and harmony.
